column5: Hey all.  Anyone hear from G.B. AKA SNAG in the past while?  CCMT and I both tried to get a hold of him and couldn't.  I know he's left the job he was at for a long time and took on something new so I don't have any of his info anymore to touch base.  I need to get a TO Pike fix in with him again.  PM me if you know how I can reach out to G.B. AKA SNAG.  Thanks.  Geoff

He's hiding out in his lab right now, hunched over his work bench...  tweaking dollar baits and plotting his triumphant return!!  I'll let him know that he's been called upon..  Until then, prhaps I can be of service?!
thanks Fidel (even thought we have yet to meet face to face) I appreciate it. And there is no problem with the "rama" lures to use as a search bait...
PS, should I bring my gear to work next week?  LOL
I got a 3 piece tapped to the underside of my desk dude!!
NICE! We'll work something out and tell G.B. to show up too.
Big G is always down.  We would need to get to the water before we call him though...  He has a nasty habit of showing up before the arranged time so he can sting fish before I get to the water!!
